text: Razve tot, kto neotstupno stoit nad kazhdym zhivym sushchestvom i [vidit] to, chto ono vershit, [podoben tomu, kto ne takov]? [Nevernyye] poklonyayutsya naryadu s Nim drugim bogam. Skazhi im, [Mukhammad]: "Prizovite ikh! Ili zhe povedayte Yemu chto-libo takoye, chego On ne vedayet na zemle. A inache [vashi idoly] - tol'ko pustyye slova". Da, nevernyye obol'stilis' sobstvennoy khitrost'yu, i soshli s puti istiny. A togo, kogo sbivayet [s puti istiny] Allakh, nikto ne vyvedet na pryamoy put'
